Title: 37731 - # Tips for Having a Successful E-Commerce Business
Direction: 500 words: List 3-6 tips for having a successful e-commerce business. Discuss the importance of social media, advertising/marketing, having the right merchant solutions tools, having brand ambassadors, etc. You can include the client link when discussing merchant solutions. Your audience consists of business owners, mostly women, who are looking to improve their business.

Title: 37732 - # Services That Making Owning a Business Easier
Direction: 500 words: Discuss 3-6 services that are great for assisting small business owners. There are several tools business owners can use to increase efficiency, save time, and cut down on costs. Talk about what some of these services provide and why they are excellent for small business. You can mention the client link by discussing  that online payment processing services are available as an option as well. Your target audience is small business owners.
